generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with white lane markings, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are walking on a designated area next to the road, separated by curbs and poles, indicating a sidewalk.
- building: A structure with commercial signs and what appears to be a bus stop shelter is visible in the background.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the image, showing a red light.
- traffic sign: A red circular "No Entry" sign and a parking sign are visible.
- vegetation: Trees are present throughout the image, including in the foreground and background.
- terrain: Grass is visible along the roadside and in small patches.
- sky: The sky is visible in the background, appearing overcast.
- person: Many people are visible walking on the sidewalk and crossing the street.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road and parked or driving near the sidewalk.
- bus: A red double-decker bus is visible in the background.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible on the road, near the center-right of the image.
- bicycle: No bicycle is clearly visible in the image.
